import{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useTheme=()=>{// On first load, check localStorage, then system preference
const getInitialTheme=()=>{if(typeof window==='undefined')return'light';const saved=localStorage.getItem('theme');if(saved)return saved;if(window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches)return'dark';return'light';};const[theme,setTheme]=useState(getInitialTheme);const toggleTheme=()=>{setTheme(theme==='light'?'dark':'light');};useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem('theme',theme);},[theme]);return{theme,toggleTheme};};
